creator: engle_mars@yahoo.com.cn
text:
For unknow reason the service crash and find the crash information in Event Viewer of window.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Faulting application tomcat6.exe, version 2.0.3.0, time stamp 0x4641d105, faulting module ntdll.dll, version 6.0.6001.18000, time stamp 0x4791a7a6, exception code 0xc0000005, fault offset 0x00065844, process id 0x1efc, application start time 0x01c953961e65fdf8.

creator: markt@apache.org
text: There is insufficient information in this bug report to investigate. Best guess would be that the JVM crashed.
